I apologize for making this long comment, but I would like to put my two cents towards NTR and this doujin in particular. NTR is a perfectly valid kink to have, whether you want to be cucked or do the cucking. Personally, I don't like NTR but I DO like good writing, and the setup for this doujin was very reasonable and felt well paced. We were given time to feel happy about the romantic relationship blossoming, but while yes, photographs of illicit relationships are taboo enough in Japan to be worried about, it is definitely quite the overused trope in NTR. But, I believe that doesn't immediately ruin a doujin's fap potential; it all depends on how it's written. The sex scenes were decent and I enjoyed the girl's tits i mean design, so I have no problems with this doujin, a good 8/10 for me.

As for NTR in general, the appeal is rarely actually getting cucked, although there are doujins that appeal to that kink. Doujins where the girl starts to like it (aka, when it becomes cheating), is what evokes the feeling of being cucked, and while that isn't my preference, there are those who like it, and shouldn't be judged for it. 

Of course, I'm still going to laugh and call them cucks LOL
Cultural differences aside, can we all agree that getting blackmailed for hugging someone is just retarded as hell? I'm sure not all Japanese people aren't as prune and rigid as we tends to believe
